childMarkdownRemark.html: My son absolutely loves attending buds and blooms! Its lovely to see him interacting with the residents and also seeing how happy the children make them. Ginnie puts so much effort into each group and Model courts staff and residents are always so welcoming. Highly recommend as a parent and baby/toddler group!

My 2 boys love going here, and we really appreciate the hard work put in by Ginny and the ladies at Rondel house. Would highly recommend to anyone with small children who would like a smaller more personal group.

My almost three year old, Megan, and I really love attending Buds and Blooms at Morel Court. Ginny organises a great range of activities from singing and crafts to parachute games and stories. Megs favourite thing by far though is interacting with her friends; the care home residents!

My almost three year old, Megan, and I really love attending Buds and Blooms at Morel Court. Ginny organises a great range of activities from singing and crafts to parachute games and stories. Megs favourite thing by far though is interacting with her friends; the care home residents!

We are really enjoying the new Buds and Blooms groups! My little ones (2 and 4) have so much fun with the other children and the residents. Lots of lovely songs and rhymes to learn together with props, stories, and parachute games. We would really recommend this friendly, welcoming and fun group to anyone who is considering it!

Lola and I have been attending buds and blooms since September last year...where to start!
